ai-ps3.4:1.2_0: “Mendicants, all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-ps3.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics.
ai-ps3.4:2.1_0: And how does a mendicant ground the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics?
ai-ps3.4:2.2_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-ps3.4:2.9_0: right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-ps3.4:2.10_0: That’s how a mendicant grounded on ethics develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.
ai-ps3.4:3.1_0: All the plants and seeds that achieve growth, increase, and maturity do so depending on the earth and grounded on the earth.
ai-ps3.4:3.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, acquiring great and abundant good qualities.
ai-ps3.4:4.1_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, acquiring great and abundant good qualities?
ai-ps3.4:4.2_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.

ai-ps3.4:4.10_0: That’s how a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, acquiring great and abundant good qualities.”

ai-ps3.4:6.2_0: being oppressed by insight, he is the escape from seclusion, about the being parted from insight opposite secure,
ai-ps3.4:6.3_0: From the first jhāna and discovering of insight, the hindrances, immersion through the first jhāna, and the view of all activities, the enlightenment of views, etc., he becomes dispassionate towards the escape from that jhāna, and is the escape from the defilements. As to the noble path, the attainment of cessation, the path, extinguishment, and the path.
ai-ps3.4:6.4_0: These are the five kinds of seclusion.
ai-ps3.4:6.5_0: These are the five things that are strong, then the mind is full of faith, and energy.
ai-ps3.4:7.2_0: fading away, cessation, giving away, and letting go of all attachments, the ending of fading away,
ai-ps3.4:7.3_0: Recollecting the hindrances, the stilling of the fading away of concentration, the hindrances, the corruptions of the view that, the hindrances, and the noble eightfold path, and the fading away of concentration as its object. And from the stilling of the hindrances, the ending of fading away, cessation, extinguishment.
ai-ps3.4:7.4_0: These are the five right views that are fading away.
ai-ps3.4:7.5_0: These five aggregates are settled and devoted to the faithful mind.
ai-ps3.4:8.2_0: When departing from that, the cessation of annihilation ceases, the cessation of annihilation,
ai-ps3.4:8.3_0: When you depart, the hindrances have been stilled, and the hindrance of the corruptions, then you should cultivate the concentration enlightenment factor: it comes to the noble path to the end of suffering in the way that is to say, the penetration of the path leading to the end of the deathless, and the cessation of defilements.

ai-ps3.4:8.5_0: These are the five things that are strong, guarded, and protected by desire; and their mind is properly resolved.

ai-ps3.4:14.1_0: “Mendicants, all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-ps3.4:14.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the seven awakening factors depending on and grounded on ethics. ...
ai-ps3.4:14.5_0: When you develop the five powers ...
ai-ps3.4:15.1_0: All the plants and seeds that achieve growth, increase, and maturity do so depending on the earth and grounded on the earth.
ai-ps3.4:15.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the five faculties depending on and grounded on ethics, achieving growth, increase, and maturity in good qualities.

ai-ps3.4:19.7_0: The story at seclusion is finished.
